title: ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Field Investigator Posts
description: Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) Haryana has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Field Investigator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, and B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the ESIC Haryana Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, and application fee. and how to apply for these posts.
